page.title: 19APPENDIX. QUESTIONNAIRE 1
page.content: 1.(a){How long have you lived here ? (b){Did you go to Fulstow School ? 2.(a){How long have you lived in this {house ? (b){Have you lived anywhere else in this{village ? 3. {Do you enjoy living here ? if yes - why if no - why not 4. {Do you work in the area ? where ? if not, if not where? 5. {Were you born within 5 miles of {this village ? 6. {Do you regularly visit either {church or chapel ? 7. {Which is the furthest place you {have visited away from this {village ? 8. {Do you ever use the bus service {to Louth or Grimsby ? 9. {Do you regularly use the new {village hall ?
